gvprojects.chess.model

Class Rook

  • java.lang.Object
    • gvprojects.chess.model.ChessPiece
      • gvprojects.chess.model.Rook
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    gvprojects.chess.model.IChessPiece

    public class Rook
extends ChessPiece
    A Rook Class that extends IChessPiece to make a Rook that overrides the isValidMove to implement Rook rules
    Version:
    March 18, 2013
    Author:
    rohrj
